title: ‘IS attack’ kills 3 US personnel in Syria; 3 hurt
body: Two US Army soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed in Syria yesterday by a suspected Islamic State attacker who targeted a convoy of American and Syrian forces before being shot dead, the US military said. The attack was barely a month after Syria announced it had signed an agreement with the US-led coalition against IS, which coincided with Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa's visit to White House. The attacker was a member of the Syrian security forces, three local officials told Reuters.
